name: Space Feud
description:
!! Controls are only the arrow keys - use right to select in the menu screen !!

This is a space survival game, where you try to dodge incoming bullets, while collecting coins. You get points based on how long you survive and how many coins you collect.

This game was made for the Nokia 3310 Jam 2, with the following requirements:
- 84x48 pixel display
- Only two colours: #c7f0d8 and #43523d
- Maximum of 12 controls/buttons
- Only monophonic sounds

!! Technical mishap means it was never actually submitted !!
